mapper.insert: insert into st_audit_his( register_number, audit_person, audit_date, audit_result, turn_down_reason, turn_down_note, status_cd ) values ( #{registerNumber}, #{auditPerson}, now(), #{auditResult}, #{turnDownReason}, #{turnDownNote}, #{statusCd} )
mapper.select: select audit_id as auditId , register_number as registerNumber, audit_person as auditPerson, audit_date as acceptDate, audit_result as auditResult, turn_down_reason as turnDownReason, turn_down_note as turnDownNote, status_cd as statusCd from st_audit_his where register_number =#{registerNumber}

select audit_id as auditId , register_number as registerNumber, audit_person as auditPerson, audit_date as acceptDate, audit_result as auditResult, turn_down_reason as turnDownReason, turn_down_note as turnDownNote, status_cd as statusCd from st_audit_his where register_number =#{registerNumber} and status_cd = 1
